26.text:
On August 21, 2020, T-Mobile US, Inc. (“T-Mobile”)




      provided information regarding tax reporting with respect to the subscription rights to purchase T-Mobile’s common stock, par value $0.00001 per share, that were issued on June 26, 2020 to T-Mobile’s stockholders as of 5:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on
      June 25, 2020.

27.text:
The information contained in Item 7.01 and the exhibit attached hereto shall not be deemed “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of the

      incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing.
